OrgName: Caris MPI Inc. and Caris Science Inc., and their affiliated companies in the United States
activities:
Caris will use and otherwise process personal information received about employees (including employees of its subsidiaries and affiliates) for the following purposes: Workflow management, such as assigning, managing, and administering projects; Compensation, including stock plan administration and compensation analysis; Payroll processing; Performance management; Succession planning; Benefits and personnel administration, such as health and medical benefits, leave entitlements, bonuses, and pensions; IT helpdesk and support services; and
Monitoring and enforcing compliance with company policies and procedures.

Caris will use and otherwise process personal information received about patients for the following purposes:  Providing tumor profiling services and/or individual molecular diagnostic test orders; Anonymised analysis of biomarker and cancer type data to publish at medical meetings and medical journals; Anonymised biomarker and/or profiling service research within clinical studies; Providing customer service; Marketing; and Collecting payment.

Caris will use and otherwise process personal information received about healthcare professionals, distributors and other limited third parties for the following purposes:  Providing support for patient services; General communications; Other research and/or analysis; Marketing; and Collecting payment for services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Croatia, Cyprus, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Employees, patients, end-users, healthcare professionals and distributors.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities & Swiss FDPIC.
